tool_description: Creates a comprehensive dietary profile based on user preferences, restrictions, and lifestyle factors to guide meal planning decisions.

dietary_restrictions.description: List of dietary restrictions (e.g., vegetarian, vegan, gluten-free, dairy-free, nut-free, kosher, halal)

food_preferences.description: List of preferred cuisines or foods (e.g., mediterranean, asian, italian, seafood, spicy)

dislikes.description: List of disliked foods or ingredients to avoid

cooking_skill.description: Cooking skill level: beginner, intermediate, or advanced

time_availability.description: Average minutes available for meal preparation per day (15-180)

error_messages: Invalid dietary restriction: Use recognized restrictions like vegetarian, vegan, gluten-free, dairy-free, nut-free, kosher, halal.
Invalid cooking skill level: Must be one of [beginner, intermediate, advanced].
Invalid time availability: Must be between 15 and 180 minutes.
Conflicting dietary restrictions: Some combinations may be incompatible (e.g., vegan and specific meat preferences).
usage: Provide dietary_restrictions, cooking_skill, and time_availability as minimum requirements. Optionally add food_preferences and dislikes for more personalized recommendations.

profile_id.description: Unique identifier for the created dietary profile

restriction_summary.description: Summary of all dietary restrictions and preferences

recommended_cuisines.description: Cuisines that match the dietary profile

complexity_level.description: Recommended recipe complexity based on skill and time
